topic:
**“Data Science Roadmap in 30 Seconds”**

🎥 **Visuals (Short):**

1. **Hook:** Fast moving “DATA SCIENCE” text + laptop coding
2. **Step 1:** Excel/CSV sheets animation
3. **Step 2:** Python code screen (Pandas/NumPy)
4. **Step 3:** Charts/graphs (bar + line chart)
5. **Step 4:** ML model icon (brain/AI)
6. **Step 5:** Real project dashboard + “Hired!” text
7. **End:** “Start Today ✅” + Subscribe CTA
